modName: Connor Kenways Armour from Assassins Creed III
descriptionHtml:
I coloured, textured and re-made Connor Kenway\'s Armour from the new Assassins\' Creed III game

I said this was standalone but I hadn\'t uploaded the mesh for the armour for it, so until I do, you guys will have to use it as a replacer for the Master Robes. sorry for the inconveinience.

YOU NEED TO REPLACE MY TEXTURE WITH THE MASTER ROBES IN YOUR GAME.

*This only works for MALES
*This is REPLACER

Thank you.
author: Olaffsen
